headline: Directors Guild Is Urged To Tweak Health Plan
abstract: Taking leave can result in lost coverage, as one female director discovered after giving birth. Sheâ€™s enlisted Amy Schumer, Amy Poehler and others in her effort to get the rules revised.
lead_paragraph: Among the achievements and accolades that the photojournalist and director Jessica Dimmock has amassed are three World Press Photo prizes, an Emmy nomination, a Guggenheim Fellowship, and membership in the exclusive international photo agency VII.
